constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 3066.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 2 of Section 3 of Article IV of the Constitution.
Clause 18 of Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H2153]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]

title: Guam Cigarette Tax Enforcement Act
